content: I apologize for the confusion. "The Paranoid Style in American Politics" was published in November 1964, not in 1967. My previous statement was incorrect. The article was published in Harper's Magazine in November 1964. It was in this article that Hofstadter used the term "conspiracy theory" to describe a certain type of political attitude, and it has become one of his most famous and widely read work. I apologize for the confusion caused by my previous response.
